PHRASE.LANG: In a warrior universe, these are the warrior supreme. You can’t run, you can’t hide. The Daleks are here! EXTERMINATE! Doctor Who logo © 2013 and TM BBC. Dalek image © BBC/ Terry Nation 1963. Licensed by BBC WW Ltd. [#Legal]

Dans un univers de guerriers, ce sont les guerriers suprêmes. Vous ne pouvez pas vous échapper, vous ne pouvez pas vous cacher. Les Daleks sont là ! EXTERMINEZ ! Doctor Who logo © 2013 and TM BBC. Dalek image © BBC/ Terry Nation 1963. Licensed by BBC WW Ltd. [#Legal]

Sie sind die größten Krieger in einem kriegerischen Universum. Du kannst nicht weglaufen und du kannst dich nicht verstecken. Die Daleks sind hier! VERNICHTEN! Doctor Who logo © 2013 and TM BBC. Dalek image © BBC/ Terry Nation 1963. Licensed by BBC WW Ltd. [#Legal]

In un universo di guerrieri, loro sono i più temibili. Non puoi fuggire, né nasconderti. Sono arrivati i Dalek! STERMINARE! Doctor Who logo © 2013 and TM BBC. Dalek image © BBC/ Terry Nation 1963. Licensed by BBC WW Ltd. [#Legal]

En el universo de los guerreros, este es el guerrero supremo. No intentes correr, no trates de esconderte: ¡los Daleks están aquí! ¡EXTERMINACIÓN! Doctor Who logo © 2013 and TM BBC. Dalek image © BBC/ Terry Nation 1963. Licensed by BBC WW Ltd. [#Legal]

In a warrior universe, these are the warrior supreme. You can’t run, you can’t hide. The Daleks are here! EXTERMINATE! Doctor Who logo © 2013 and TM BBC. Dalek image © BBC/ Terry Nation 1963. Licensed by BBC WW Ltd. [#Legal]
